overview: Raúl is a journalist and foodie, he makes photographic reports and articles for some magazines specialized and for their own social networks. After spending a few days in Mexico, he begins a trip to the border with the United States to make a report on the restaurants on the road on the mythical route 66. His nightmare will begin when he wakes up in the middle of the desert and tied with a chain to an old man car, no water, no food and no possibility of escape.
title: Fuel
